title: Kuru extends!
content: Antti @anhelkuru Kuru stays! The versatile Finnish veteran who played a crucial part in our #ECL24Spring Elite campaign will continue to wear the virtual TBJ jersey

title: Sandro Wüller signs for The Black Jacks!
content: Sandro @I-THE_EAGLE-I Wüller will round up our roster for #NHL25 as the 28-year-old Hessian joins us from @hclugano Esports ♠️

title: Elite Finnish goalie Kostiii will wear The Black Jacks jersey!
content: We welcome Santeri @Kkostiiii1 Kostiainen! The 31-year-old Goalie joins us after spending the last two ECL Elite Seasons at @VesaPompa and will strengthen us between the pipes as Simeon @Simbanho Vorselman will head into military service this autumn ♠️
